name: nativescript-coachmarks
description: Display user coach marks with a couple of shape cutouts over an existing UI for NativeScript.

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns emulate ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-coachmarks && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.setup: cd demo && npm install && cd .. && npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin add .. && cd ..
